title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value was set in the list box of the report parameter. After step 5, the OK button can still be used.
EB: The default value should be retained in the list box of the report parameter. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter.
2. Set the Display type to List Box.
3. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. Modify the default value from 'aa' to 'aaa' directly and click OK.
6. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
7. Verify that the default value 'aaa' is retained in the list box of the report parameter. Verify that the OK button is grayed out.
